Detailed Description

Cholesky Decomposition.

For a symmetric, positive definite matrix A, the Cholesky decomposition is an lower triangular matrix L so that A = L*L'. If the matrix is not symmetric or positive definite, the constructor returns a partial decomposition and sets an internal flag that may be queried by the CholeskyDecomposition.IsSPD property.
